New Records: Virat Kohli made an unbeaten 64, KL Rahul scored 50, and Suryakumar Yadav contributed 30 runs
Key Match Events: The match was a rain-affected game where Bangladesh scored 145 for 6 after a revised target of 151 in 16 overs; Litton Das scored 60 runs before a collapse; Arshdeep Singh's last-over performance led to Bangladesh's failure
Pre-Game Insights: India moved to top of Group 2 with six points, one ahead of South Africa who have played one game fewer
Post-Match Reflections: Zimbabwe's defeat ended their hopes of reaching the semi-finals
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was high-scoring with key contributions from both teams; weather conditions affected the game
